alert.note: Alert for Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Weston County Plains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued November 12 at 1:55PM MST until November 13 at 5:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 314, 315, AND 317... .Unseasonably warm temperatures are expected Monday with highs from 60-65 degrees. Monday afternoon minimum relative humidities may dip as low as 13 percent. Southwest winds will increase to 15 to 25 mph Monday afternoon with gusts to 40 mph possible. The combination may create critical fire weather conditions Monday afternoon. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 314, 315, AND 317... The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a Fire Weather Watch for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from Monday morning through Monday afternoon. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 314 Northern Campbell, 315 Southern Campbell and 317 Weston County Plains. * WINDS...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 13 percent. * IMPACTS...The combination of gusty winds and low relative humidity would produce critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Weston County Plains
